name: DiveStick
description:
Part of PIGSquad #summerslowjams 2019

3 Button 3 Color Jam

source: https://github.com/thesage1014/pigsSSJomt/

HOW TO PLAY:

Turns are simultaneous. Select your move first or respond to your opponent before the timer runs out.

You can only use each move once. You are made of sticks, which will break if you are not careful.

Note: Excessive button mashing may exert excessive intent on the surrounding environment and is not recommended

CONTROLS:

  • Keyboard:
    • p1:  up , down , left
      p2:  E   ,  D       , A
    Gamepad (please be nice and share one controller thnx):
    • p1:  Triangle, X, Square
    • p2:  Dpad-up, down, right
